thread.title: Kendall and Kylie Jenner Hype Their New Collection by Ignoring Winter Completely
thread.title_full: Kendall and Kylie Jenner Hype Their New Collection by Ignoring Winter Completely

title: Kendall and Kylie Jenner Hype Their New Collection by Ignoring Winter Completely
text: Kendall and Kylie Jenner Hype Their New Collection by Ignoring Winter Completely February 17, 2017 4:48 PM View on Instagram Today at noon, Kendall and Kylie Jenner will debut what is being billed as "DropOne" from their eponymous collection, Kendall + Kylie . But in the lead-up to what may well end up being an Internet-breaking release, the sisters have been promoting the line on social media in a way that speaks to pretty much everyone in mid-February. Namely, on the brand's Instagram account , they have posted a series of tropically set photographs of themselves in what we can only assume are clothes from the collection. Both women are seen repeatedly against a backdrop of palm fronds, while Kylie appears gazing out at a lush landscape of bougainvillea and palm trees. And yes, the appeal of this garden imagery is certainly not lost on us. In fact, we're pretty much ready to go on a trip to wherever this was shot. But we have to say, we're equally intrigued by whatever modern home is depicted in these images. Its glass floor-to-ceiling window panes and sleek furniture are the perfect anecdotes for any cluttered interior. And as for the surrounding grounds? Let's just say we are seriously thinking about putting an upholstered armchair in our own yards come this spring. Below, a look at some of images. Loading
